questions.questionText: HTML ka full form kya hai? / What does HTML stand for?
HTML file ka extension kya hota hai? / What is the extension of an HTML file?
Paragraph likhne ke liye kaunsa tag use hota hai? / Which tag is used to write a paragraph?
Line break dene ke liye kaunsa tag hota hai? / Which tag is used for line breaks?
Headings ke liye kaunse tags use hote hain? / Which tags are used for headings?
HTML mein image insert karne ke liye kaunsa tag hota hai? / Which tag is used to insert an image in HTML?
Hyperlink banane ke liye kaunsa tag use hota hai? / Which tag is used to create a hyperlink in HTML?
Form banane ke liye HTML mein kaunsa tag use hota hai? / Which tag is used to create a form in HTML?
Text aur password fields ke liye kaunse input types use hote hain? / Which input types are used for text and password fields?
HTML mein comment likhne ka sahi syntax kya hai? / What is the correct syntax for writing comments in HTML?
List items add karne ke liye kaunsa tag use hota hai? / Which tag is used to add list items in HTML?
Niche diye gaye options mein se kaunsa table-related tag nahi hai? / Which of the following is NOT a table-related tag?
HTML mein <div> ka kya use hai? / What is <div> in HTML?
options: Content ko group karne ke liye ek container hai
questions.correctAnswer: Content ko group karne ke liye ek container hai

questions.questionText: <span> kis type ka element hai? / What type of element is <span>?
Button banane ke liye kaunsa sahi HTML tag hai? / Which is the correct tag to create a button?
DOCTYPE declaration ka use kya hai? / What is the purpose of the DOCTYPE declaration in HTML?
options: Page ka heading set karta hai
HTML version browser ko batata hai
questions.correctAnswer: HTML version browser ko batata hai

questions.questionText: Kaunsa tag page ka title set karta hai? / Which tag sets the page title in the browser tab?
HTML element ke kaunse parts hote hain? / Which parts make up an HTML element?
Kaunsa valid HTML element hai? / Which is a valid HTML element?
Niche diye gaye options mein se kaunsa self-closing element hai? / Which of the following is a self-closing element?
